title: PBE Summoner name selection bug
body: Everything comes up unavailable. I even tried putting in pure gibberish for 5 minutes and its all taken. Please fix so I can play.

replies.body:
Is this occurring on the Beta Client or on the Legacy Client for the PBE? If you haven't tried using both clients to see if this is exclusive to one, I recommend doing so.

Let me know what you find out.
I was using the beta player but upon logging in to try again today I already had a summoner name, looks like the first one I tried actually worked it was just bugged so I was stuck in that screen.
